title: DJ Session: Mariachi
teaser: Cynthia Munoz, an expert on all things mariachi, shares examples of the genre’s range, including 13-year-old Sebastien De La Cruz.
contentencoded:
Cynthia Munoz, host of MariachiMusic.com Live on KEDA in San Antonio joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson for the latest installment of DJ Sessions. Munoz, an expert on all things mariachi, shares examples of the genre’s range, from a 13-year-old mariachi superstar to a group that goes back more than a century.

  • Check out more DJ Sessions

Note: We have a Spotify playlist for our weekly DJ Sessions segment. The playlist is updated each week with new songs. Spotify is free to use, but requires a login.

Songs In This Segment

Mariachi Aztlan, “El Alegre”

Sebastien De La Cruz, “Mi Dicen Gallo”

[Youtube]

Sebastien De La Cruz, National Anthem (at 2013 NBA Finals)

[Youtube]

Linda Ronstadt, “Los Laureles”

[Youtube]

Mariachi Vargas de Tecalitlán, “Huapangos de Ruben Fuentes”

Guest

  • Cynthia Munoz, host of MariachiMusic.com Live on KEDA in San Antonio.
